description: This file defines a command-line interface (CLI) module for a universal project initializer tool. It handles argument parsing, project configuration creation, template instantiation, and interaction with templates to generate project structures. Additionally, it includes functions to output configuration details and retrieve run commands for specific project types.

classes.name: TemplateInitInfo
classes.description: Holds configuration details for initializing a project, including commands, environment setup, and scripts.

classes.name: ProjectConfig
classes.description: Configuration object containing project metadata such as name, version, description, author, type, output path, and parameters.

classes.name: ProjectType
classes.description: Enum-like class providing project type options and a method to convert from string.

classes.name: ProjectInitializer
classes.description: Main class responsible for creating project templates, initializing projects, and managing the workflow.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] parse_parameters(params_str: str)
methods.description: Parses a comma-separated key=value string into a dictionary with appropriate data types.

methods.name: ProjectConfig create_project_config(args)
methods.description: Creates a ProjectConfig instance from CLI arguments.

methods.name: ProjectConfig create_minimal_project_config(project_type: str, parameters: str = None)
methods.description: Creates a minimal ProjectConfig for retrieving template info without full setup.

methods.name: str make_path_absolute(path: str, base_path: Path)
methods.description: Converts a relative path to an absolute path based on a base path.

methods.name: dict template_init_info_to_dict(init_info: TemplateInitInfo, project_path: Path)
methods.description: Serializes a TemplateInitInfo object into a dictionary with absolute paths suitable for JSON output.

methods.name: output_json(success: bool, message: str, template_info: TemplateInitInfo = None, project_path: Path = None)
methods.description: Formats and prints a JSON response indicating success or failure, along with messages and optional template info.

methods.name: output_get_run_command(project_type: str, run_command: str)
methods.description: Outputs a JSON object containing the project type and its associated run command.

methods.name: handle_get_run_command(args)
methods.description: Handles the logic for retrieving the run command for a given project type via CLI arguments.

methods.name: main()
methods.description: Entry point that sets up argument parsing, handles project initialization or run command retrieval, and manages overall CLI flow.

ctags.name: output_json
ctags.pattern: /^def output_json(success: bool, message: str, template_info: TemplateInitInfo = None, project_pat/
ctags.signature: (success: bool, message: str, template_info: TemplateInitInfo = None, project_path: Path = None)
